item.description:
Bella Luna's 15th Anniversary "Night of Salsa" Celebration!
Join other salsa lovers in celebrating Bella Luna's 15th Anniversary with a "NIGHT OF SALSA"!

When: Friday Nov 14th 9pm - 1am
Where: Milky Way 403 Centre St. Jamaica Plain
Who: All salsa lovers!

Schedule:
9-9:45pm - history of salsa presentation with Jose Masso
9:45 - 10:30pm - salsa lessons with MetaMovements
12am - performance by MetaMovements
11pm -1am - Dancing with DJ Jose Masso

Cost: $10 before 10pm, $13 after 10pm.

Buy your tickets early and get VIP treatment! (No waiting in line and if you've been to Saturday nights here, you know the line can get long!) Contact Anara to buy VIP tickets before Fri Nov 14th - $13 for the general public and $11 for Meet-up Members. VIP tickets are good for the whole night, so arrive anytime and still no line!

Please note, you can purchase on paypal, but you MUST contact Anara in advance or your name may not be on the list at the door. Please also bring your printed paypal receipt.
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a black shirt that says MM Salsa! on the front

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: "Night of Salsa" Celebration at Bella Luna!
